explains: n. 引诱，诱惑；诱惑人的东西；（魔鬼对耶稣的）引诱（the Temptation）
wordGroup: resist the temptation 抵制诱惑；抵挡住诱惑
resist temptation 抵制诱惑；不受引诱

sentences.en: An expensive bicycle is a temptation to thieves.
sentences.cn: 高档自行车对窃贼是个诱惑。

sentences.en: I yielded to temptation and had a chocolate bar.
sentences.cn: 我经不住诱惑，吃了一大块巧克力。

sentences.en: Will they be able to resist the temptation to buy?
sentences.cn: 他们能抵抗得住购买的诱惑吗？
